cards.detail: {{#patient}}You recently had high blood pressure readings (> 130 systolic or > 80 diastolic), but do not have a recorded diagnosis of hypertension. You may want to discuss with your care team.{{/patient}}{{#careTeam}}Patient had multiple blood pressure readings of SBP > 130mm Hg and/or DBP > 80. This suggests the patient may have Stage 1 Hypertension, but no diagnosis was found.{{/careTeam}}|[ { "id": "contact-suggestion", "label": "Contact care team diagnosis", "type": "suggestion-link", "actions": [{"label":"Contact your care team about high blood presure diagnosis", "url":"/contact"}] } ]|at-most-one|
